title: normals already suck with "dynamic que"
body: yay i have a plat 5 jungler against a diamond jungler guess what happens? diamond jungler better so he snowballs while plat 5 jungler super bad and afk. luck of the draw boyz

replies.body: it actually gives you incentive to only play in full partys for elo, why would i want a shitter retard thresh who cant lantern when i can duo with someone with brains at every role? broken system
